scripts.build: npm run build:content && npm run build:background && npm run copy
scripts.build:content: esbuild src/content.ts --bundle --format=iife --banner:js='/*! Unix Timestamp Tooltip – Content Script. Scans visible text nodes for Unix timestamps (10–13 digits). All processing occurs locally. No data is transmitted, logged, or stored externally. */' --outfile=dist/content.js
scripts.copy: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r src/*.html src/*.css dist/
scripts.cleanbuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run zip
